Package Manual.services

Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
Manual.services.BaseService<Project,​Long,​ProjectRepo>
Manual.services.ProjectService
public class ProjectService extends BaseService<Project,​Long,​ProjectRepo>
Class that models from ProjectDTO using ProjectMapper to be intermediary between the ProjectController and the database
Author:
sps169, FedericoTB
